    • Method Detail

      • buildPacket

        Packet buildPacket(byte[] rawdata,
                 java.net.Inet4Address sourceIP)
        Builds a Packet from raw data
        Parameters:
        rawdata - Packet data, received as a byte[]
        sourceIP - IP from which the data originated
        Returns:
        Packet (Advert, Bid, BidWin or Data) built from given data

      • buildPacket

        Packet buildPacket(java.net.DatagramPacket data)
        Builds a Packet from a Datagram
        Parameters:
        data - the received Datagram
        Returns:
        Packet (Advert, Bid, BidWin or Data) built from given data

      • buildAdvert

        Packet buildAdvert(Data data,
                 int maxBid,
                 int fine)
        Builds an Advert from scratch
        Parameters:
        data - the Data which the Advert is advertising
        maxBid - maximum bid accepted in the auction
        fine - fine in case of transaction failure
        Returns:
        Advert built from given data

      • buildBid

        Packet buildBid(Advert advert,
              int bid)
                throws NegativeBidException
        Builds a Bid from scratch
        Parameters:
        advert - the Advert to which the Bid repsonds
        bid - value of the bid
        Returns:
        Bid built from given data
        Throws:
        NegativeBidException

      • buildDummyBid

        Packet buildDummyBid(int transactionID,
                   int bid)
                     throws NegativeBidException
        Builds a dummy Bid in case no Bid was received
        Parameters:
        transactionID -
        bid -
        Returns:
        dummy Bid
        Throws:
        NegativeBidException

      • buildBidWin

        Packet buildBidWin(Bid bid,
                 int fine)
        Builds a BidWin from scratch
        Parameters:
        bid - value of the winning bid
        fine - fine in case of transaction failure
        Returns:
        BidWin built from given Data

      • buildCheck

        Packet buildCheck(java.lang.String rawData)
        Builds a Check from a String (since all Data sent over TCP is sent as Strings this method uses Strings rather than byte[]).
        The String's format is as follows:
        Starting with the Packet type, followed by the information divided by spaces. A $ marks the end of a chunk of data. example:
        "C transactionID amount balance $"
        Parameters:
        rawData - Packet data, received as a String
        Returns:
        Check built from given Data

      • updateData

        Packet updateData(Data packet,
                java.net.Inet4Address destinationIP)
        refresh TTL and the like of an old packet
        Parameters:
        packet - Data Packet that needs to be updated
        destinationIP - destination of the Data packet
        Returns:
        updated Data Packet

      • getStreamableData

        java.lang.String getStreamableData(Packet packet)
        turn Packet into data that can be sent over TCP
        Parameters:
        packet - Packet to be sent
        Returns:
        String starting with the Packet type, followed by the information divided by spaces. A $ marks the end of a chunk of data. example:
        "W transactionID winnerIP winningBid fine $"

      • getDatagramPacket

        java.net.DatagramPacket getDatagramPacket(Packet packet)
        turn Packet into data that can be sent over UDP
        Parameters:
        packet - Packet to be sent
        Returns:
        DatagramPacket containing all of the Packet's info squeezed into a byte[]
